content: अघोष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [नास्ति घोषो यस्य यत्र वा] {@--1@} Hard-sounding, See below. {@--2@} Devoid of cow-herds. --षः The hard sound of a consonant, hollowness of sound with which all hard consonants and the Visarga are pronounced (one of the 11 kinds of बाह्यप्रयत्न, See <ls>P. VIII. 2. 1</ls>), or the consonants so pronounced (खयां यमाः खयः ZकVपौ विसर्गः शरएव च . एते श्वासानुप्रदाना अघोषाश्च विवृण्वते).
